titles.title: A bill to prohibit for 12 months the closure or relocation of any Veterans' Administration readjustment counseling center or any other change in the mission or organization of Veterans' Administration medical facilities.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 10/14/1987--Introduced. Prohibits for 12 months the closure or relocation of any Veterans Administration (VA) readjustment counseling center or any change in the mission or organization of VA medical facilities.
